subject: Soccer
Frauds and Swindling
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors have cleared Lionel Messi of wrongdoing but are seeking an 18-month prison sentence for his father, Jorge Horacio Messi, who they said defrauded Spain’s tax office.
snippet: Prosecutors have cleared Lionel Messi of wrongdoing but are seeking an 18-month prison sentence for his father, Jorge Horacio Messi, who they said defrauded Spain’s tax office.
